Articles.Content:
Like a lot of recent games and upgrade/updated games, i bet they're gonna add in a photo mode! Like a legit one, where you can change filter settings, contrast and brightness and even maybe poses for kerbals!  Maybe this should be in the "i wish they'd add" section..  lol

Edited July 23, 2021 by JSlone
In such a beautiful game it would be illegal not too. Even if it doesnt happen people would just make a mod for it.

How did I not think of this!!!!!!

Beautiful games should always have a photo mode. For example, the new AC games, which are all beautiful, have photo modes. It would be a shame if ksp 2 did not have a photo mode at some point.
